flavorText: "Here and gone like a fleeting breeze."

foreignData.flavorText: „Hier und fort … wie eine flüchtige Brise."
foreignData.name: Dem Wind überlassen
foreignData.text: Schicke eine bleibende Karte deiner Wahl, die kein Land ist, ins Exil. Solange jene Karte im Exil ist, kann ihr Besitzer sie wirken, ohne ihre Manakosten zu bezahlen.

foreignData.flavorText: "Hoy estamos aquí, pero nos iremos como una brisa fugaz".
foreignData.name: Dispersar en el viento
foreignData.text: Exilia el permanente objetivo que no sea tierra. Mientras esa carta permanezca exiliada, su propietario puede lanzarla sin pagar su coste de maná.

foreignData.name: Dispersé aux quatre vents
foreignData.text: Exilez le permanent non-terrain ciblé. Tant que cette carte reste exilée, son propriétaire peut la lancer sans payer son coût de mana.

foreignData.flavorText: "Un istante prima è qui, l'istante dopo è svanito, come una brezza fugace."
foreignData.name: Disperdere nel Vento
foreignData.text: Esilia un permanente non terra bersaglio. Fintanto che quella carta rimane esiliata, il suo proprietario può lanciarla senza pagare il suo costo di mana.

foreignData.flavorText: 「一瞬の風のように翻弄せよ。」
foreignData.name: 風への放流
foreignData.text: 土地でないパーマネント１つを対象とし、それを追放する。そのカードが追放され続けているかぎり、それのオーナーはそれをそれのマナ・コストを支払うことなく唱えてもよい。

foreignData.name: 바람으로 해방
foreignData.text: 대지가 아닌 지속물을 목표로 정한다. 그 지속물을 추방한다. 그 카드가 추방되어 있는 한, 그 카드의 소유자는 마나 비용을 지불하지 않고 그 카드를 발동할 수 있다.

foreignData.flavorText: "Um dia estamos aqui, no outro não, efêmeros como uma brisa.."
foreignData.name: Soltar ao Vento
foreignData.text: Exile a permanente alvo que não seja um terreno. Enquanto aquele card permanecer exilado, seu dono poderá conjurá-lo sem pagar seu custo de mana.

foreignData.name: Пустить по Ветру
foreignData.text: Изгоните целевой не являющийся землей перманент. Пока та карта остается в изгнании, ее владелец может разыграть ее без уплаты ее мана-стоимости.

foreignData.name: 清风散形
foreignData.text: 放逐目标非地永久物。于该牌持续被放逐期间，其拥有者可以施放该牌，且不需支付其法术力费用。

foreignData.name: 清風散形
foreignData.text: 放逐目標非地永久物。於該牌持續被放逐期間，其擁有者可以施放該牌，且不需支付其魔法力費用。

name: Release to the Wind
originalText: Exile target nonland permanent. For as long as that card remains exiled, its owner may cast it without paying its mana cost.

rulings.text: If a token is exiled this way, it can’t be cast.
If an exiled card has {X} in its mana cost, you must choose 0 as the value of X when casting it without paying its mana cost.

Casting the exiled card follows the normal timing rules for casting that card. For example, if the card is a creature card, you can cast that card only during your main phase while the stack is empty.

If you cast a card “without paying its mana cost,” you can’t pay any alternative costs. You can, however, pay additional costs. If the card has any mandatory additional costs, such as that of Silvergill Adept, those must be paid to cast the card.

text: Exile target nonland permanent. For as long as that card remains exiled, its owner may cast it without paying its mana cost.
